title: Great Cigar Tour of Route 119
name: Great Cigar Tour of Route 119
description:
A Map by Nabaclish

There are a bunch of great tobacco shops from the Pittsburgh, PA area down into Morgantown, WV.  Take a hundred bucks, a full tank of gas, and ride route 19 on this fun day trip cigar tour.  :)
